author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.4.2 - Source size safety limit to prevent hub memory issues:

- get_app_source and get_driver_source now truncate responses over 100KB with a warning flag
- Item-level backups (backupItemSource) also capped at 100KB to protect hub state storage
- Prevents hub slowdowns or crashes when retrieving very large app/driver source code
- Returns sourceLength and truncated flag so callers know when output is incomplete
